Hero.title: Software Engineer passionate about UX/UI Design.
Hero.description: Combining design and programming. I create web products for businesses.

Features.title: About
Features.description: Learn a little more about me.

About.title: Creating Innovative Digital Experiences
About.description: With over 10 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and more than 5 years working with React, Vue.js, and TypeScript, I am uniquely positioned to integrate design and development, creating high-performing and scalable user-focused applications

Portfolio.title: Web Development and UX/UI Design Services
Portfolio.description: Meet my agency specializing in website development, landing pages, e-commerce. High standard UI design. Check out some of the projects I had the pleasure of developing.

Cta.title: Turn your vision into digital reality
Cta.description: Are you ready to take your digital presence to the next level? As a specialist in UX/UI Design and frontend development, I'm here to turn your ideas into memorable user experiences. Together, we can create a website or application that not only meets your users' needs, but also surprises and delights.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Need help? Have a suggestion or a problem? Send me a message. I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

AboutPage.title: Software engineer passionate about UX/UI Design
AboutPage.sub-title: Aprimorando a Navegação com Design Intuitivo
AboutPage.description: Software Engineer with a focus on Frontend and UX/UI, combining design skills with solid technical knowledge. With over 10 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and more than 5 years working with React, Vue.js, and TypeScript, I am uniquely positioned to integrate design and development, creating high-performing and scalable user-focused applications.
